SEARCH
Module com.kihachu.spaceiteration1
Package com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.camera

Class RaycastingController

java.lang.Object
com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.camera.RaycastingController
public class RaycastingController extends Object
Controller class for handling raycasting interactions, such as detecting and mining asteroids, within a 3D space environment.

  • Constructor Details

    • RaycastingController

      public RaycastingController(javafx.scene.Group universeGroup, javafx.scene.Group spaceCraftGroup, SpaceCraft spaceCraft, UI ui)
      Constructs a RaycastingController object with the specified universe group, spacecraft group, spacecraft, and UI.
      Parameters:
      universeGroup - the group representing the universe.
      spaceCraftGroup - the group representing the spacecraft.
      spaceCraft - the spacecraft instance being controlled.
      ui - the user interface instance for updating text information.

      private Asteroids.Asteroid findAsteroid(javafx.scene.Node node)
      Finds the asteroid node in the scene graph.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to start the search from.
      Returns:
      the asteroid node if found, otherwise null.
